topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53aa53aa63687249798d0000#post_53aa53aa63687249798d0000

In the hour I played I've only really been introduced to the stylish martial arts. I'll need to not mash the mouse keys though, which has lead to some screwed up combos (since heavy and light attacks are done through left click). Otherwise, I was just let go into Hong Kong proper before I had to quit.

Also, I guess all the DLC packs have leveled me up all the way. Or, mostly. I got every upgrade tier except the last in both the Cop and Triad branch.

topics.body:
Hallelujah!
In case you missed it the supreme court massively upheld personal privacy with a new ruling: short version is that police *MUST* get a warrant to search people's cellphones in a 0-9 ruling.

Right about now you could hear the entire NSA swearing profanities.



On the downside:
Fuckity fuck fuck!
Wisconsin's governor Walker is being a arse; he got busted breaking the law and he's turning the case around to make a case to get rid of campaign finance limits.  I don't normally say this, *BUT* fuck you republican party; if campaign finance limits gets thrown out the window you're taking the blame for how much you'll put the country in the shitter.
